title: Measurement and Unit Comparison

vocab.definition: Finding out how long, tall, heavy, or big something is
A small unit used to measure length
A unit of length equal to 12 inches
A tool used to measure length in inches
A good guess about how much or how many
How hot or cold something is

teachingNotes: Use rulers and measuring tapes to measure classroom objects. Compare lengths of different items. Practice estimating before measuring. Introduce centimeters as well as inches.

sample.question: What tool would you use to measure the length of your desk?
